name: Orange Square Cyan Blocks
description:
A randomly generated 2d platformer bathed in neon. See who amongst your friends can get the best time as you jump. bounce, and dash your way to the finish line!

OSCB is all about finding the fastest path through a build, shave off seconds from your time as you air-dash at the right time, find shortcuts, or take advantage of the verticality of the level.

Controller is recommended!
